Articles.Content: We also exist. Welcome to our forum. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

You exist, we exist, thank God... there will be peace in our time between humans and aliens.

We might have to join forces against the robots of course. 

Greetings Alienoid .. or rather, Saber! We humanoids welcome you to the forums. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

We come in peace, shoot to kill, shoot to kill... He's dead Jim!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-10T01:57:05Z" title="07/10/2015 01:57  AM" data-short="9 yr">July 10, 2015</time> by kiwi1960**
I actually don't like to be caled "Human",please call me a bot ![:mad:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_angry.gif)
